verses.text: Now the \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Reuben|strong="H7205"\w* the \w firstborn|strong="H1060"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, (for he \add was\add* the \w firstborn|strong="H1060"\w*; but, forasmuch as he \w defiled|strong="H2490"\w* his \w father’s|strong="H0001"\w* \w bed|strong="H3326"\w*, his \w birthright|strong="H1062"\w* was \w given|strong="H5414"\w* unto the \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Joseph|strong="H3130"\w* the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*: and the genealogy is not to be \w reckoned|strong="H3187"\w* after the \w birthright|strong="H1062"\w*.

For \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w* \w prevailed|strong="H1396"\w* above his \w brethren|strong="H0251"\w*, and of him \add came\add* the chief \w ruler|strong="H5057"\w*; but the \w birthright|strong="H1062"\w* \add was\add* \w Joseph’s|strong="H3130"\w*:)\f + \fr 5.2 \ft chief…: or, prince\f*

The \w sons|strong="H1121"\w*, \add I say\add*, of \w Reuben|strong="H7205"\w* the \w firstborn|strong="H1060"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* \add were\add*, \w Hanoch|strong="H2585"\w*, and \w Pallu|strong="H6396"\w*, \w Hezron|strong="H2696"\w*, and \w Carmi|strong="H3756"\w*.

The \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Joel|strong="H3100"\w*; \w Shemaiah|strong="H8098"\w* his \w son|strong="H1121"\w*, \w Gog|strong="H1463"\w* his \w son|strong="H1121"\w*, \w Shimei|strong="H8096"\w* his \w son|strong="H1121"\w*,
\w Micah|strong="H4318"\w* his \w son|strong="H1121"\w*, \w Reaia|strong="H7211"\w* his \w son|strong="H1121"\w*, \w Baal|strong="H1168"\w* his \w son|strong="H1121"\w*,

\w Beerah|strong="H0880"\w* his \w son|strong="H1121"\w*, whom \w Tilgath-pilneser|strong="H8407"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* of \w Assyria|strong="H0804"\w* carried \w away|strong="H1540"\w* \add captive:\add* he \add was\add* \w prince|strong="H5387"\w* of the \w Reubenites|strong="H7206"\w*.\f + \fr 5.6 \ft Tilgath-pilneser: also called, Tiglath-pileser\f*

And his \w brethren|strong="H0251"\w* by their \w families|strong="H4940"\w*, when the \w genealogy|strong="H3187"\w* of their \w generations|strong="H8435"\w* was \w reckoned|strong="H3187"\w*, \add were\add* the \w chief|strong="H7218"\w*, \w Jeiel|strong="H3273"\w*, and \w Zechariah|strong="H2148"\w*,

And \w Bela|strong="H1106"\w* the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Azaz|strong="H5811"\w*, the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Shema|strong="H8087"\w*, the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Joel|strong="H3100"\w*, who \w dwelt|strong="H3427"\w* in \w Aroer|strong="H6177"\w*, even unto \w Nebo|strong="H5015"\w* and \w Baal-meon|strong="H1186"\w*:\f + \fr 5.8 \ft Shema: or, Shemaiah\f*

And \w eastward|strong="H4217"\w* he \w inhabited|strong="H3427"\w* unto the \w entering|strong="H0935"\w* in of the \w wilderness|strong="H4057"\w* from the \w river|strong="H5104"\w* \w Euphrates|strong="H6578"\w*: because their \w cattle|strong="H4735"\w* were \w multiplied|strong="H7235"\w* in the \w land|strong="H0776"\w* of \w Gilead|strong="H1568"\w*.

And in the \w days|strong="H3117"\w* of \w Saul|strong="H7586"\w* they \w made|strong="H6213"\w* \w war|strong="H4421"\w* with the \w Hagarites|strong="H1905"\w*, who \w fell|strong="H5307"\w* by their \w hand|strong="H3027"\w*: and they \w dwelt|strong="H3427"\w* in their \w tents|strong="H0168"\w* \w throughout|strong="H6440"\w* all the \w east|strong="H4217"\w* \add land\add* of \w Gilead|strong="H1568"\w*.\f + \fr 5.10 \ft throughout…: Heb. upon all the face of the east\f*

¶ And the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Gad|strong="H1410"\w* \w dwelt|strong="H3427"\w* over against them, in the \w land|strong="H0776"\w* of \w Bashan|strong="H1316"\w* unto \w Salchah|strong="H5548"\w*:

\w Joel|strong="H3100"\w* the \w chief|strong="H7218"\w*, and \w Shapham|strong="H8223"\w* the \w next|strong="H4932"\w*, and \w Jaanai|strong="H3285"\w*, and \w Shaphat|strong="H8202"\w* in \w Bashan|strong="H1316"\w*.

And their \w brethren|strong="H0251"\w* of the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* of their \w fathers|strong="H0001"\w* \add were\add*, \w Michael|strong="H4317"\w*, and \w Meshullam|strong="H4918"\w*, and \w Sheba|strong="H7652"\w*, and \w Jorai|strong="H3140"\w*, and \w Jachan|strong="H3275"\w*, and \w Zia|strong="H2127"\w*, and \w Heber|strong="H5677"\w*, \w seven|strong="H7651"\w*.

These \add are\add* the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Abihail|strong="H0032"\w* the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Huri|strong="H2359"\w*, the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Jaroah|strong="H3386"\w*, the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Gilead|strong="H1568"\w*, the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Michael|strong="H4317"\w*, the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Jeshishai|strong="H3454"\w*, the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Jahdo|strong="H3163"\w*, the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Buz|strong="H0938"\w*;

\w Ahi|strong="H0277"\w* the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Abdiel|strong="H5661"\w*, the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Guni|strong="H1476"\w*, \w chief|strong="H7218"\w* of the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* of their \w fathers|strong="H0001"\w*.

And they \w dwelt|strong="H3427"\w* in \w Gilead|strong="H1568"\w* in \w Bashan|strong="H1316"\w*, and in her \w towns|strong="H1323"\w*, and in all the \w suburbs|strong="H4054"\w* of \w Sharon|strong="H8289"\w*, upon their \w borders|strong="H8444"\w*.\f + \fr 5.16 \ft their…: Heb. their goings forth\f*

All these were reckoned by \w genealogies|strong="H3187"\w* in the \w days|strong="H3117"\w* of \w Jotham|strong="H3147"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* of \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w*, and in the \w days|strong="H3117"\w* of \w Jeroboam|strong="H3379"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*.

¶ The \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Reuben|strong="H7205"\w*, and the \w Gadites|strong="H1425"\w*, and \w half|strong="H2677"\w* the \w tribe|strong="H7626"\w* of \w Manasseh|strong="H4519"\w*, of valiant \w men|strong="H2428"\w*, \w men|strong="H0582"\w* able to \w bear|strong="H5375"\w* \w buckler|strong="H4043"\w* and \w sword|strong="H2719"\w*, and to \w shoot|strong="H1869"\w* with \w bow|strong="H7198"\w*, and \w skilful|strong="H3925"\w* in \w war|strong="H4421"\w*, \add were\add* \w four|strong="H0702"\w* and \w forty|strong="H0705"\w* \w thousand|strong="H0505"\w* \w seven|strong="H7651"\w* \w hundred|strong="H3967"\w* and \w threescore|strong="H8346"\w*, that went \w out|strong="H3318"\w* to the \w war|strong="H6635"\w*.\f + \fr 5.18 \ft valiant…: Heb. sons of valour\f*
And they \w made|strong="H6213"\w* \w war|strong="H4421"\w* with the \w Hagarites|strong="H1905"\w*, with \w Jetur|strong="H3195"\w*, and \w Nephish|strong="H5305"\w*, and \w Nodab|strong="H5114"\w*.

And they were \w helped|strong="H5826"\w* against them, and the \w Hagarites|strong="H1905"\w* were \w delivered|strong="H5414"\w* into their \w hand|strong="H3027"\w*, and all that \add were\add* with them: for they \w cried|strong="H2199"\w* to \w God|strong="H0430"\w* in the \w battle|strong="H4421"\w*, and he was \w intreated|strong="H6279"\w* of them; because they put their \w trust|strong="H0982"\w* in him.

And they took \w away|strong="H7617"\w* their \w cattle|strong="H4735"\w*; of their \w camels|strong="H1581"\w* \w fifty|strong="H2572"\w* \w thousand|strong="H0505"\w*, and of \w sheep|strong="H6629"\w* two \w hundred|strong="H3967"\w* and \w fifty|strong="H2572"\w* \w thousand|strong="H0505"\w*, and of \w asses|strong="H2543"\w* two \w thousand|strong="H0505"\w*, and of \w men|strong="H0120"\w* an \w hundred|strong="H3967"\w* \w thousand|strong="H0505"\w*.\f + \fr 5.21 \ft took…: Heb. led captive\f*\f + \fr 5.21 \ft men: Heb. souls of men\f*

For there \w fell|strong="H5307"\w* down \w many|strong="H7227"\w* \w slain|strong="H2491"\w*, because the \w war|strong="H4421"\w* \add was\add* of \w God|strong="H0430"\w*. And they \w dwelt|strong="H3427"\w* in their steads until the \w captivity|strong="H1473"\w*.

¶ And the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of the \w half|strong="H2677"\w* \w tribe|strong="H7626"\w* of \w Manasseh|strong="H4519"\w* \w dwelt|strong="H3427"\w* in the \w land|strong="H0776"\w*: they \w increased|strong="H7235"\w* from \w Bashan|strong="H1316"\w* unto \w Baal-hermon|strong="H1179"\w* and \w Senir|strong="H8149"\w*, and unto \w mount|strong="H2022"\w* \w Hermon|strong="H2768"\w*.

And these \add were\add* the \w heads|strong="H7218"\w* of the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* of their \w fathers|strong="H0001"\w*, even \w Epher|strong="H6081"\w*, and \w Ishi|strong="H3469"\w*, and \w Eliel|strong="H0447"\w*, and \w Azriel|strong="H5837"\w*, and \w Jeremiah|strong="H3414"\w*, and \w Hodaviah|strong="H1938"\w*, and \w Jahdiel|strong="H3164"\w*, \w mighty|strong="H1368"\w* \w men|strong="H0582"\w* of \w valour|strong="H2428"\w*, \w famous|strong="H8034"\w* \w men|strong="H0582"\w*, \add and\add* \w heads|strong="H7218"\w* of the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* of their \w fathers|strong="H0001"\w*.\f + \fr 5.24 \ft famous…: Heb. men of names\f*

¶ And they \w transgressed|strong="H4603"\w* against the \w God|strong="H0430"\w* of their \w fathers|strong="H0001"\w*, and went a \w whoring|strong="H2181"\w* \w after|strong="H0310"\w* the \w gods|strong="H0430"\w* of the \w people|strong="H5971"\w* of the \w land|strong="H0776"\w*, whom \w God|strong="H0430"\w* \w destroyed|strong="H8045"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* them.

And the \w God|strong="H0430"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* stirred \w up|strong="H5782"\w* the \w spirit|strong="H7307"\w* of \w Pul|strong="H6322"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* of \w Assyria|strong="H0804"\w*, and the \w spirit|strong="H7307"\w* of \w Tilgath-pilneser|strong="H8407"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* of \w Assyria|strong="H0804"\w*, and he carried them \w away|strong="H1540"\w*, even the \w Reubenites|strong="H7206"\w*, and the \w Gadites|strong="H1425"\w*, and the \w half|strong="H2677"\w* \w tribe|strong="H7626"\w* of \w Manasseh|strong="H4519"\w*, and \w brought|strong="H0935"\w* them unto \w Halah|strong="H2477"\w*, and \w Habor|strong="H2249"\w*, and \w Hara|strong="H2024"\w*, and to the \w river|strong="H5104"\w* \w Gozan|strong="H1470"\w*, unto this \w day|strong="H3117"\w*.
